text: Ekler'o'shock is an independent music house established in Paris in 2002. According to their website, they "produce, publish and manage artists that [they] believe in." Its current artists include Benjamin Clementine, DatA, Polo & Pan, Limousine, Paris, Alexandre Chatelard. Previous artists include Danger, Marie Madeleine, Maxence Cyrin, Léonard de Léonard and Terry Poison.Ekler'o'Shock Website – "About Us" ==References== Category:French record labels Category:2002 establishments in France Category:Record labels established in 2002
title: Ekler'o'shock
